description: '''Laïko''' or '''laïkó''' ({{langx|el|λαϊκό [τραγούδι]|laïkó {{noitalics|[}}tragoúdi{{noitalics|]}}}}, {{IPA|el|lai̯ˈko traˈɣuði|pron}}; {{lit}} "[song] of the people", "popular [song]"; {{abbr|pl.|plural}} {{langx|el|λαϊκά [τραγούδια]|laïká {{noitalics|[}}tragoúdia{{noitalics|]}}|label=none}}) is a [[Greece|Greek]] [[folk-pop]] music genre in accordance with the tradition of the [[Greeks|Greek]] people. Also referred to as "folk song" or "urban folk music" ({{langx|el|αστική λαϊκή μουσική|astikí laïkí mousikí|label=none}}) in its plural form, Laïkó changed forms over the decades after the [[commercialization]] of [[Rebetiko]] music.
